title: [Large-Scale] Content-Based English Pedagogy Design for Early Childhood Education Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary English vocabulary and comprehension of sentence structures
context.additional_context: Focused on improving practical English skills linked to early childhood education, optimized for smartphone-based mobile learning environments.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately utilize over 300 core multi-word units required in early childhood education contexts.
Through auditory discrimination training, learners can articulate key phonemes in early childhood pronunciation (e.g., /θ/, /ð/, /ŋ/) with 90% accuracy.
Applying LMS-based self-directed learning strategies, learners autonomously perform language practice for 150+ minutes per week.

resources: Mobile App with Speech Recognition Capability
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
